sentences.sContent: Race officials announced a handful of new sponsors on Tuesday.
sentences.sCn: 比赛官员们星期二公布了几位新赞助人。

remMethod.val: spons(音似： 四帮四) + or → 以四帮四的形式资助别人 → 赞助

words.tran: 赞助；发起；保证人的地位；教父母身份

trans.tranCn: 发起人 v发起, 主办, 赞助
trans.tranOther: A sponsor is a person or organization that sponsors something or someone
